About Billy's Stone Crab Market & Waterfront Seafood Restaurant
Known internationally and locally as one of the best seafood restaurants in South Florida, Billy's Stone Crab has the freshest, top-quality stone crab and seafood in the business.
Our Story
Started in 1975 as a retail and wholesale seafood company by
Billy Hershey
, the highly popular
Billy's Seafood Restaurant
and
Market
opened in Miami Springs in 1977. After seven years, we moved our eatery to North Bay Village and renamed it Billy's On the Bay. We opened our current waterfront location at 400 North Ocean Drive in the heart of Hollywood Beach in 1995.
In addition to our fresh seafood market and restaurant in Hollywood, FL, our business has grown over the years to incorporate a fishery, an extensive selection of wines, a casual dining area, outdoor cabanas, an online shipping company, and an expansion of our wholesale business.
Our Seafood
Our fishery
(BSC Fisheries)
catches stone crabs, Florida lobster, yellowtail snapper, and other seafood daily, then delivers it fresh to our restaurant. You will enjoy delicious specialty dishes that come straight from the Florida Keys to your plate in 24 hours.
We fish in local waters because we believe our customers deserve the most superior seafood possible.We operate two fish houses in Marathon and Summerland Key, both located in the Florida Keys. Over 40 boats supply our fish houses with
delicious stone crab, lobster and fresh fish
daily.
We ensure this by catching it ourselves, then hand-picking the best for you. Dine in our restaurant, eat inside our market, or purchase fresh products to take with you.
Our Values
Family-owned and operated,
Billy's Stone Crab
is an iconic business in the Fort Lauderdale area. We are a part of the community and pride ourselves on providing the best experience for our guests. Our team is attentive to every detail, so you enjoy the freshest selections in our elegant dining location, excellent service, breathtaking views, killer martinis, and much more. You are family here, and we strive to give you only the best.
Our Services
Our multi-level fine dining establishment features stunning views of the Intracoastal Waterway from the seating areas. We offer indoor and outdoor dining options with full bar service. Catch a majestic Florida sunset during your lunch or dinner of fresh seafood,
King crab legs
, and fresh-baked
key lime pie
for dessert. Or grab something to take home or enjoy right away in our market. We can also
ship stone crabs
, shrimp, and seafood overnight so that you can savor our fresh catches anywhere in the world.
If you are out on the water, dock your boat at Billy's and enjoy a fantastic meal. Our staff can also pack meals for your fishing trips and other boating adventures. We offer valet service for those coming by car, so you won't have to worry about finding a parking spot.
Our Testimonials
The Miami and Hollywood community love Billy's for good reason! Read these real customer testimonials and check out
our feature on South Florida PBS
.
"Hands down this is the best restaurant in all of Hollywood Walk South Florida..." -Philise Anderson
"I don't even want to review it because I don't want anyone to come and take my seats." -Dennis Lopez
"The stone crabs are out of this world!" -Martha Keneth
Come Visit Us in Hollywood, FL

Waterfront Private Event Venue at Billy's Stone Crab
Planning an Event? Give us a call.
Event Director: Michael Leffler 954.394.1915
WHAT WE OFFER
A Personal Event Planner | Customized Menus | Private Room | TV for Presentations
Billy's Stone Crab Waterfront Restaurant
is a charming venue that offers an idyllic setting for special events and occasions in North Ocean Drive, Florida. With its breathtaking waterfront views, delicious cuisine, and impeccable service, it's the perfect location for birthdays, corporate events, and intimate gatherings. Whether you're looking for a romantic atmosphere or a place to celebrate with family and friends, Billy's Stone Crab Waterfront Restaurant is the ideal choice. Don't miss out on the opportunity to create unforgettable memories at this stunning venue. Book your special event today!
NOTE:
By filling in the form, it does not confirm or guarantee a booked event. One of our team members will contact you to confirm your events' date and time. Thank you, and we look forward to hosting your special event.
